entry.title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/container-apps-jobs
entry.content: This sample shows how to create Azure Container Apps Jobs via Azure CLI and Bicep and how to start and monitor these components.

entry.title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/dotNET-FrontEnd-to-BackEnd-on-Azure-Container-Apps
entry.content: This repository demonstrates a typical front-end UI built with ASP.NET and a complementary back-end API.

entry.title: https://github.com/Azure-Samples/dotNET-Frontend-AB-Testing-on-Azure-Container-Apps
entry.content: Demonstration of how ASP.NET Core developers can use Azure App Configuration's Feature Flags capabilities with Azure Container App revisions to A/B test front end apps.

entry.content: A backend for a chat application written in Python FastAPI framework

entry.title: https://github.com/Azure/bicep
